list.abs: ...反之，若是只有三名线锋，而却安排有四名线卫，则构成了「3 - 4 防御」(3 – 4defense)，此时较靠近中间内侧的两名线卫，就被称为「内线卫」(inside linebacker,ILB)。通常防守一方的11名球员中，会有一名线卫来担任类似进攻一方四分卫角色的球员，亦即防守组组长。在列队时一旦发现了己方的弱点与.

entry.tran: （美式橄榄球中的）线卫，中后卫
entry.def: In American football, a linebacker is a player who tries to stop members of the other team from scoring by tackling them.

means.word_mean: 1. a defensive football player who takes a position close behind the linemen
2. the position of a defensive football player who plays close behind the line of scrimmage
